sentences: Jose "Boboy" Teves Garrovillo Jr. (born 10 October 1951) is a Filipino singer and actor known for being a member of the musical trio APO Hiking Society.
He has performed with the APO Hiking Society in almost all major cities in the Philippines, apart from holding a series of concerts in Asia, Middle East, United States, Canada, and Europe.
Garrovillo was born October 10, 1951 to Jose Garrovillo Sr.
